original_definition: 'matched orders' means all buy and sell orders matched by the price coupling algorithm or the continuous trade matching algorithm;
generated_definition: 'matched orders' means orders that are placed by the same client and are executed at the same time on the same trading venue, regardless of the order type or execution venue.

Article 2: ‘matched orders’ means all buy and sell orders matched by the price coupling algorithm or the continuous trade matching algorithm;
